metadata.name: Meta Sculpture - Perpetuum Integrale
metadata.description:
Meta Sculpture - Perpetuum Integrale
Meta Avatar - Rezat

Falling apart.
Putting it back together.
The eternal cycle of a colorful life.



---
1920 x 1920 px, 5 seconds, 24 FPS, perfect loop.

Each meta sculpture is a work of art and an avatar.

Manually modeled from a single polygon, hand sculpted, procedurally textured. Visual effects procedurally generated with a set of self-developed tools.

The output is a full 3D animation, 100% original content.
